document_data.name: Xendreth
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Xendreth''' was the ruling council of [[Malydren]], composed of both the preeminent wizards and clerics of the [[ixzan]] city.

Unlike most ixzan communities, mutant ixzan, such as temperamental [[Bhylqex]], were allowed to join the clergy and become wizards, so they could also join the council. For many centuries, the council was in fact strongly influenced by the two [[Vampire|vampiric]] ixzan [[Zekaqux]] and [[Phiaqiv]].
